channel.title: Arena Wins
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Arena Wins"

item.title: Re: Arena Wins
item.content:encoded: Get your power in your current season, then loop to a different bloodline and get your bloodline in that season. If you loop to the third bloodline and get your power with that, you'll have three powers. Simple as that.

item.title: Re: Arena Wins
item.content:encoded: i fought a guy in the arena who has both legacy and redeye. how do I get two bloodlines too?

item.title: Re: Arena Wins
item.content:encoded:
maybe i'm getting this wrong, but didn't he ask, if you could get let's say 2 redeye items in the same season if you win 10 times in the arena on 2 different days?

i'm prolly gettin it wrong but if thats what he asked then the answer would be no, wouldn't it?

mfg
Thark

item.title: Re: Arena Wins
item.content:encoded:
Is that not what Uzuki said?
White eye power has 2 chances and the others dont

item.title: Re: Arena Wins
item.content:encoded: Sorry Uzuki but that's not entirely correct. WhiteEyes have two chances to use theirs but Legacy and RedEye don't. I'm not certain if two bloodlines of the same type stack.

item.title: Re: Arena Wins
item.content:encoded: Correct, since you can only have one bloodline per season. The WhiteEye power has two uses, that's why you see WhiteEye's having two chances to use theirs. They didn't have to get 10 wins in a single day to be like that.

item.title: Arena Wins
item.content:encoded: Can you only get 1 arena bloodline item per season?
